TEXT.TITLE: MICROPOLIS <MLIS> SELLS CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: Micropolis Corp is raising 75 mln dlrs via an offering of convertible subordinated debentures due 2012 with a six pct coupon and par pricing, said lead manager Kidder, Peabody and Co Inc. The debentures are convertible into the company's common stock at 48.50 dlrs per share, representing a premium of 23.6 pct over the stock price when terms on the debt were set. Non-callable for two years, the issue is rated B-minus by Standard and Poor's. Robertson, Colman and Stephens co-managed the deal. Reuter
